/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene. The predominant colors in the image are green from the trees, gray from the buildings, and blue from the sky.
